department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply , installation and removal of oxygen and carbon dioxide storage tanks
description: Details of the materials to be supplied and services to be provided are outlined in the updated subject part of the procurement notice .
full_summary:
**Tenders**
===============

**Bid ID**
-----------


23572-240769 Bulk Carbon Dioxide and Oxygen


### Description


Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites proposals for the supply, installation, and removal of oxygen and carbon dioxide storage tanks, as well as the supply of oxygen and carbon dioxide in bulk. This request for proposal is intended for Natural Resources Canada (NRCan). 


### Details

*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 29, 2024 at 14:00EDT.
*   **Procurement Type**: Competitive – Open Bidding.
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price.
*   **Amendment Number**: 2.
*   **Publication Date**: February 28, 2024.
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2024.
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2027.



### Particulars


The successful bidder will be required to supply and install oxygen and carbon dioxide storage tanks for Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), as well as provide oxygen and carbon dioxide in bulk.



### Bid Submission Guidelines

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and the CanadaBuys posting closing time specified in the Ariba Discovery posting. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 29, 2024 at 14:00EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.



### Contact Information

Inquiries related to this bid should be directed to:

Tea, Richard (SPAC/PSPC)
E-mail: richard.tea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
DIC (Telephone, Fax, email): Not available.



### Resources

The bid documentation package can be accessed at:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18935250?extsite=MTg5MzUyNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement. The tender notice has been published under the same bidding procedures
